channel.title: Why is my port not open/forwarded?
channel.description:
hi, i have opened the port 43594 on in my router settings, but ppl still cant connct to my server, and everyone says u need to open your port, whne it already is?
can anyone help?
vertual servers (check this pic to see if ive done it right)
[url=http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/5963/belkinport2.png]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/5963/belkinport2.png[/url]
